Texts.Chs: 阿威坎历史 —— 第一部分
大约在2500 BF（飞天前）某个时候，一群游牧民族在阿威卡哈山中发现了传说中的城市瓦司·瓦哈'雷赫（Vas Vha'leih）。 这个被古者们遗留下来的城市，为游牧民族提供了如此丰富的物资，以至于他们决定进行阿威坎有史以来的首次定居。 游牧民族的人数不断增加，随着时间的流逝，他们被称为定居者·科登。
Texts.Eng: Sometime around 2500 BF (Before Flight), a group of nomads found the legendary city of Vas Vha'leih in the Avikha Mountains. This city, left behind by the Old Ones, provided the nomads with such bountiful supplies that they decided to settle, for the first time in Avikan history. The nomads grew in numbers and as time passed they became known as the Khoden, the settlers.

Texts.Chs: 阿威坎起源于沙漠行星卡达文，这是一个干旱的世界，几乎没有绿洲，也有许多危险。 我们祖先的最早记录是在北部阿威卡哈（Avikha）地区发现的，该地区的水供应量最多。 我们的祖先是游牧民族，总是在大地上旅行以寻找水和食物。
Texts.Eng: The Avikan originate from the desert planet of Kadavan, an arid world with few oases and many dangers. The first records of our ancestors were found in the northern region of Avikha, which is the most plentiful in water supplies. Our ancestors lived as nomads, always travelling the lands in search of water and food.

Texts.Chs: 圣城万荣（Vas Vha'leih），亲爱的读者。 在这一系列简短的卷轴中，我伊扎蒂·卡拉丹（Izyati as-Kaladan）将小小地描述伟大的阿威坎人民的历史，他们作为一个民族的奋斗以及最终的命运，使他们永远不会忘记我们的出身和战斗理由。
Texts.Eng: Vas Vha'leih, dear reader. In this series of short scrolls, I, Izyati as-Kaladan, shall briefly describe the history of the great Avikan people, their struggles as a nation and their eventual fate, that none will ever forget our origins and our reason to fight.
